title: Specific heat capacity - time for temp change

content.question: Approximately how long would it take for the temperature of the water to increase by <math alttext="10 degrees Celsius" overflow="scroll"> <mn>10</mn> <mspace width="0.25em"> </mspace> <mo rspace="0em">°</mo> <mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi> </math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="1.3 times 10 to the 4 power seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>1.3</mtext><mo>×</mo><msup><mtext>10</mtext><mn>4</mn></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
